description:
Job Summary:

Adventure Travel Inc. is seeking a highly motivated and experienced Remote Marketing/Sales Director to join our team. As the Marketing/Sales Director, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective marketing and sales strategies to promote our adventure travel services and drive business growth. This is a full-time, remote-based position with a competitive salary and benefits package. This role is an individual contributor position, meaning you will have the opportunity to make a direct impact on our company's success.

Compensation & Benefits:

- Competitive pay
- Comprehensive benefits package including health, dental, and vision
- Paid time off and holidays
- Remote work flexibility

Responsibilities:

- Develop and execute marketing and sales strategies to increase brand awareness and generate leads
- Create and manage marketing campaigns across various channels, including social media, email, and PPC
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistency in brand messaging and customer experience
- Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities in the adventure travel industry
- Build and maintain relationships with potential clients, industry partners, and key stakeholders
- Monitor and report on marketing and sales performance, making data-driven recommendations for improvement
- Maintain a deep understanding of our target audience and customer needs
- Stay up-to-date with industry developments and changes to inform marketing and sales strategies

Requirements:

- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in marketing and/or sales, preferably in the travel industry
- Proven track record of developing and implementing successful marketing and sales strategies
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
- Experience working remotely and managing virtual teams
- Proficiency in marketing and sales software, such as Google Analytics, Salesforce, and Hootsuite
